layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x64
  RenderBlock {html} at (0,0) size 800x64
    RenderBody {body} at (8,16) size 784x32
      RenderBlock {p} at (0,0) size 784x32 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 308x16
          text run at (0,0) width 308: "This paragraph should have a green background"
        RenderBR {br} at (307,0) size 1x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,16) size 273x16
          text run at (0,16) width 273: "because its title attribute begins with \"foo\""
